Marshalltown—290; 2. Dowling Catholic—292 Medalist— Nate Vance, Marshalltown—68; runner-up– Cole Davis, Marshalltown—69. HORSERACING At Prairie Meadows Thursday's Results First (3 yo's & up, One Mile Seventy Yards) — 5 Lolo (Vazquez) $14.60/$6.20/$2.60; 2 Miss Sentry (Laviolette) $4.80/$2.40; 3 Camy Award (Thompson) $2.20. E: $48.20. Q: $11.20. S: $26.24 (5-2-3-4). T: $23.25. Second (3 yo's & up, Four And A Half Furlongs) — 4 At Bat (Risenhoover) $4.20/$3.60/$3.00; 10 Yah Yah Sir (Laviolette) $6.20/$5.20; 8 Great Anticipation (Murphy) $12.80. D: $11.20. D: $41.00. E: $28.80. Q: $47.40. S: $82.04 (4-10-8-9). T: $126.45. Third (3, 4, 5 & 6 yo's, One And One Sixteenth Miles) — 2 Holdthatlove (Corbett) $4.00/$2.20/$2.20; 5 Zella Rose (Vazquez) $2.20/$2.20; 4 Spring Special (Birzer) $2.40. E: $8.20. Q: $4.20. S: $3.56 (2-5-4-6). T: $3.65. 3: $11.75. S: $15.31 (1-3-4-8). T: $23.45. 3: $16.50. Fifth (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs) — 4 Hanslow (Vazquez) $6.20/$2.40/$2.20; 9 Doc Radke (Birzer) $2.80/$2.20; 6 Lord Turnem (Thompson) $2.20. E: $21.00. Q: $14.00. S: $7.89 (4-9-6-8). T: $10.55. 3: $29.55. 4: $64.50. T: $55.15. 3: $61.35. Seventh (3 yo's & up, One Mile) — 4 Otter Cove (Risenhoover) $4.20/$3.40/$2.20; 6 Donoharm (Vazquez) $5.40/$4.20; 7 Andrew L (Birzer) $4.20. E: $21.80. Q: $24.20. S: $26.35 (4-6-7-3). T: $45.20. 3: $39.55. Eighth (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs) — 11 Rootie Tourtie (Vazquez) $7.00/$5.00/$4.00; 5 Bristol Rover (Corbett) $5.00/$5.00; 2 Cajun Streaker (Risenhoover) $4.40. E: $69.40. Q: $24.80. S: $65.60 (11-5-2-7). T: $87.05. 3: $40.60. Friday's 5:30 p.m. line First (3, 4, 5 & 6 yo's, Six Furlongs)— 1 Jonesy (Vazquez) 15-1; 2 American Lioness (Corbett) 7-5; 3 Tenacious Tatum (Birzer) 7-2; 4 Tazzy Tiara (Risenhoover) 9-2; 5 Holy Marie (Laviolette) 4-1; 6 Exotic Kitty (Roman) 15-1; 7 Bonnie Bluejeans (Murphy) 12-1. Second (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs)— 1 Natalies Storm (Mello) 4-1; 2 Value Your Song (Roman) 5-1; 3 Ivy Jo (Tohill) 12-1; 4 Danas Harbor (Corbett) 8-1; 5 Smarty Party (Thompson) 3-1; 6 Economy of Motion (Birzer) 5-2; 7 R R Mingo (Wethey, Jr.) 6-1. Third (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs)— 1 Spring to the Wire (Murphy) 12-1; 2 Bernard Road (Kennedy) 6-1; 3 Spring d'Oro (Birzer) 8-1; 4 Just Economics (Tohill) 6-1; 5 Commander Gib (Corbett) 5-2; 6 Gavar (Vazquez) 6-5. Fourth (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs)— 1 Steva La Diva (Birzer) 6-1; 2 Crimsonluckytrick (Cardoso) 15-1; 3 Highly Contagious (Risenhoover) 8-1; 4 Mooch (Corbett) 7-2; 5 Codys Cupcake (Laviolette) 3-1; 6 Jaco Ia (Thompson) 12-1; 7 No Shanks (Mello) 5-1; 8 Joy of the Saints (Kennedy) 4-1. Fifth (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs)— 1 Dreamin (Vazquez) 3-1; 2 La Reina de Iowa (Risenhoover) 12-1; 3 Ts Theregoesmycash (Murphy) 7-2; 4 Cowboy's Mary L (Thompson) 9-2; 5 Emmy Got Even (Laviolette) 5-1; 6 Heed to Speed (Birzer) 5-2. Sixth (3 yo's & up, One And One Sixteenth Miles)— 1 Golden Elite (Laviolette) 8-1; 2 Hot Shot Socks (Corbett) 10-1; 3 High Noon Cocktail (Risenhoover) 8-5; 4 Tour to Glory (Vazquez) 8-1; 5 Maxnificent (Birzer) 10-1; 6 Commander Storm (Mello) 15-1; 7 Radar's E. T. (Wethey, Jr.) 2-1; 8 Brides Last Affair (Tohill) 12-1. Seventh (3 yo's & up, One And One Sixteenth Miles)— 1 Bandini Moon (Tohill) 4-1; 2 Bad Moon (Vazquez) 3-1; 3 Saturday (Birzer) 9-2; 4 No Time Limit (Laviolette) 5-1; 5 Fat Tire (Roman) 6-1; 6 Paddy Party (Corbett) 8-1; 7 Jerrys Two Tickets (Kennedy) 6-1. Eighth (3, 4, 5 & 6 yo's, Six Furlongs)— 1 Bet On Bettye (Corbett) 5-2; 2 Vickies Drama (Vazquez) 4-1; 3 Kingsland Avenue (Mello) 6-1; 4 Star of Orientate (Risenhoover) 5-1; 5 Tour On (Birzer) 7-2; 6 Grace At Midnight (Kennedy) 6-1; 7 Caviar Ice (Laviolette) 8-1. Ninth (3 yo's & up, Two Miles)— 1 Cowboysteviewonder (Birzer) 6-1; 2 Prospect Knight (Risenhoover) 8-1; 3 De Facto (Mello) 6-1; 4 Lenapah (Vazquez) 3-1; 5 Ransom Canyon (Wethey, Jr.) 9-2; 6 Nanosecond (Kennedy) 8-1; 7 Hattaash (Corbett) 5-2. Tenth (3 yo's & up, Six Furlongs)— 1 Garman's Guy (Thompson) 8-1; 2 Sunshine Kim (Mello) 15-1; 3 Arrogant (Corbett) 5-1; 4 Holdmegold (Wethey, Jr.) 3-1; 5 Gone Operational (Vazquez) 10-1; 6 Greenback Dollar (Laviolette) 12-1; 7 Hope He Can Run (Murphy) 6-1; 8 Tough to Handle (Risenhoover) 9-2; 9 Burning Money (Cardoso) 10-1. HORSESHOES At Iowa State Fairgrounds Open Singles Class A— 1. Derek Bloodgood, Creston, 3-1; 2. John Ridgely, Earlham, 3-1; 3. Steve Hatch, Knoxville, 2-2; 4. Tom Cranston, Keswick, 1-3; 5. Leo Toby, New Boston, 1-3. Class B— 1. Russell Wiese, Roland, 3-1; 2. Jon Anderson, Des Moines, 3-1; 3. Frank Cardamon, Des Moines, 2-2; 4. Logan Duffy, Norwalk, 1-3; 5. Randy Clark, Monroe, 1-3. Class C— 1. Henry Morning, Anamosa, 3-1; 2. Rick Cook, Des Moines, 2-2; 3. Brandon DeBord, Des Moines, 2-2; 4. Caleb Cook, Des Moines, 2-2; 5. Dirk Braet, Calamus, 1-3. Class D— 1. Terry Pettyjohn, Oskaloosa, 4-0; 2. Andy Ellsworth, Reasnor, 2-2; 3. Sara Heeley, Van Meter, 2-2; 4. Rozann Stay, Ankeny, 2-2; 5. Don Riordan, Boone, 0-4. Farmers’ Championship Championship— 1. Kenny Hahn, Iowa City, 4-2; 2. Chris Jordan, Peru, 3-3; 3. John Ridgely, Earlham, 3-3; 4. Tom Cranston, Keswick, 2-4. Class A— 1. Richard Cranston, Keswick, 6-0; 2. Steve Hatch, Knoxville, 3-3; 3. Randy Clark, Monroe, 3-3; 4. Russell Wiese, Roland, 0-6. SIGNINGS University of Iowa— Shawn Rennegarbe, Addieville, Ill. (Arkansas transfer); Sarah Overton, Iowa City (City High). SOCCER
